Title: New CSS Editor Improvements in Visual Studio (ASP.NET 4.5 Series)
Content: The seventh in Scott Gu's [series of blog posts](http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2011/08/31/asp-net-vnext-series.aspx) about the up-and-coming features of ASP.NET 4.5 is about the [New CSS Editor Improvements in Visual Studio](http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2011/12/02/new-css-editor-improvements-in-visual-studio-asp-net-4-5-series.aspx).
